name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Consulting Engineer with 13+ years of experience delivering high-performance applications across healthcare and financial industries. Expertise in **Java**, **Python**, and **JavaScript**, enabling effective database management, data modeling, and big data analytics solutions. Proficient in creating robust APIs and middleware for seamless communication and data analysis. Skilled in agile project management and DevOps practices, ensuring effective collaboration and continuous delivery. 
Hands-on experience in **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django** for frontend and backend development. Adept at building AI/ML-powered platforms that enhance predictive analytics and real-time processing. 
In addition, I have a strong background in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, and implementing microservices, event-driven architectures, and CI/CD pipelines. Committed to compliance-driven development aligning with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards. Proficient in MLOps, including model training, serving, and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, further demonstrating my capabilities in mentoring and consultative roles.
